settings.heading: Getting Started With Nomad Flex Pay
Begin Your Affordable High-Speed Journey
settings.description:
Explore the most budget-friendly path to high-speed Internet. Browse our selection of modems, each an affordable gateway to reliable and rapid online access.

  • Cost-Effective Choices: Our range of modems is priced for affordability, ensuring you find the perfect fit for your budget.
  • Informative Insights: Gain insights into each model, helping you choose the most economically advantageous option.

settings.heading: Unlock Affordable Flexibility
settings.description:
Select Nomad Flex Pay at checkout for an economical approach to high-speed Internet. This payment option is designed to be light on your wallet while providing robust internet connectivity.

  • Budget-Friendly Subscriptions: Enjoy the benefits of high-speed Internet with a subscription model that respects your financial boundaries.
  • Comprehensive Yet Affordable: Get everything you need – from setup to support – at a cost that makes sense.

settings.heading: Secure Setup, Sensible Spending
settings.description:
Post-order, we’ll require a simple identity verification step. This not only ensures transaction security but also aligns with our commitment to providing affordable, high-speed Internet access responsibly

  • Protection Without the Price Tag: Security is paramount, but it shouldn't come at a high cost. Our verification process is part of our affordable service promise.
  • Efficient and Economical: Streamline your setup with an easy, cost-effective process that gets you connected faster.

settings.header: How does Nomad Flex Pay work?
settings.content:
Nomad Flex Pay revolutionizes rural internet access by offering an economically savvy modem rental service. This monthly subscription eliminates the need for costly purchases, ensuring you get high-speed internet at a fraction of the usual cost.

  • Rent Instead of Buy: Save money by renting a modem with a flexible, low-cost monthly plan.
  • Nomad Flex Pay: More Than Just a Modem: The monthly fee for Nomad Flex Pay is a comprehensive package designed to provide a seamless and affordable high-speed internet experience. It goes beyond just the modem rental, offering a full spectrum of services to ensure your connectivity needs are met without financial burden.
  • Extended Rental Period: Enjoy ongoing modem rental without the constraint of a fixed term.
  • All-Inclusive Services: The fee includes setup assistance, administrative support, and unlimited technical help.
  • Convenience Meets Affordability: This subscription service is tailored to your budget, offering high-speed internet access with full support, minus the hefty upfront costs.

settings.header: what does the monthly fee cover?
settings.content:
Nomad Flex Pay revolutionizes rural internet access by offering an economically savvy modem rental service. This monthly subscription eliminates the need for costly purchases, ensuring you get high-speed internet at a fraction of the usual cost.

  • Rent Instead of Buy: Save money by renting a modem with a flexible, low-cost monthly plan.
  • Convenience Meets Affordability: Experience the ease of a subscription service that aligns with your budget, providing high-speed internet without the financial strain of a large upfront purchase plus full support.

settings.header: How easy is it to set up Nomad Flex Pay?
settings.content:
Experience Risk-Free Internet Access: Nomad Flex Pay offers a 7-day risk-free trial for all new subscribers. This period begins from the day you receive your modem, giving you ample time to assess the service's quality and suitability for your needs.

  • No-Risk Testing: Test the modem and internet service in your own space, ensuring it meets your expectations for high-speed connectivity.
  • Hassle-Free Returns: If you're not completely satisfied during the trial period, you can return the modem for a full refund, no questions asked.

settings.header: How easy is it to set up Nomad Flex Pay?
settings.content:
Streamlined and Straightforward Setup: Nomad Flex Pay is designed for effortless self-installation, ensuring you can quickly and easily start using your internet service.

  • Quick Activation: The Flex Pay Modems are ready for action in under 60 seconds, making the setup process remarkably fast.
  • Complete Kit Included: Your Nomad Modem kit arrives with everything required, from the modem itself to the necessary cables, ensuring a smooth start.

settings.header: Are there any contracts with Nomad Flex Pay?
settings.content:
Flexibility Without Contracts: Nomad Flex Pay stands out for its no-contract approach, offering unmatched flexibility in internet services.

  • Cancel Anytime: You have the freedom to cancel your subscription whenever you choose, without facing any cancellation fees.
  • Easy Return Policy: If you decide to cancel, simply return the modem. This policy emphasizes convenience and customer satisfaction.
